烈.definition: ardent; intense; fierce; stern; upright; to give one's life for a noble cause; exploits; achievements

烈女.definition: a woman who dies fighting for her honor or follows her husband in death

烈屬.definition: family or dependents of martyr (in PRC, esp. revolutionary martyr)

烈山.definition: Lieshan, a district of Huaibei City 淮北市[Huai2bei3 Shi4], Anhui

烈山區.definition: Lieshan, a district of Huaibei City 淮北市[Huai2bei3 Shi4], Anhui

烈嶼.definition: Liehyu township in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan

烈嶼鄉.definition: Liehyu township in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan

烈火乾柴.definition: lit. intense fire to dry wood (idiom); inferno in a woodpile; fig. consuming passion between lovers
